name: SelenaTalkEphraim
_source: speak;Selena;Indeed I am.|And you are Prince Ephraim.
speak;Ephraim;I know you've spoken with Myrrh.|Withdraw your troops.|You must know the emperor is not rational!
speak;Ephraim;Then why?|Why do we still fight?
speak;Selena;I am a general of the empire.|His Majesty's word is law.
speak;Ephraim;That's ridiculous.|You know the emperor is deranged, and yet you follow his orders?!|Is that truly loyalty?!
speak;Selena;Prince Ephraim, you cannot understand.|I know the path I'm given is foolish.|Yet I am a knight, and I have no other.
speak;Ephraim;Selena, please!|Surrender!|I have no wish to see you die here!
speak;Selena;Me?|Die?|Prince Ephraim, you misunderstand me.|I have no intention of dying.|Madness though it may be, I will be the one doing the killing today.
